articles.title: McDonald's Spent $300 Million On Its Own Version of the Non-Chronological Feed
articles.description: If you’ve ever walked into McDonald’s and thought you’d like a side of tech with your Big Mac, don’t worry—the fast food chain as you covered.

articles.title: Craters on Pluto suggest Kuiper Belt ate its smaller bodies
articles.description: Both Pluto and Charon have a dearth of craters made by small objects.

articles.title: Qu-Bit Electronix Releases Prism for ‘Spectral Metamorphosis’
articles.description: This morning, Qu-Bit Electronix released their new Prism module.

articles.title: Everyone Should Read Customer Support Emails
articles.description: A company can learn more from people sharing their experiences than from numbers in a spreadsheet

articles.title: Federal Appeals Court Blocks San Francisco Law On Ad Warnings For Sugary Drinks
articles.description: A voter-approved law requiring large warnings about the effects of soda and other sugar-sweetened drinks was challenged by the beverage industry.
